subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Chris Sorensen of Denmark won the first uphill finish of the Giro d’Italia, and Alexandre Vinokourov of Kazakhstan maintained the overall leader’s pink jersey by 30 seconds.
snippet: Chris Sorensen of Denmark won the first uphill finish of the Giro d’Italia, and Alexandre Vinokourov of Kazakhstan maintained the overall leader’s pink jersey by 30 seconds.
